verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! O may Thy will be mine; Into Thy hand of love I would my all resign. Thro' sorrow, or thro' joy, Conduct me as Thine own; And help me still to say, My Lord, Thy will be done.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! Tho' seen thro' many a tear, Let not my star of hope Grow dim or disappear. Since Thou on earth hast wept, And sorrowed oft alone, If I must weep with Thee, My Lord, Thy will be done.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! All shall be well for me; Each changing future scene I gladly trust with Thee. Straight to my home above I travel calmly on, And sing, in life or death, "My Lord, Thy will be done."
